articles.description: Sri Lanka crisis: The island nation of 22 million reportedly has over $50 billion in debt. Of this, it needs to pay $28 billion by 2027. | World News
articles.content: Scenes emerging from Sri Lanka yet again raised global concerns this weekend as demonstrators stormed the palace of Gotabaya Rajapaksa while the president reportedly fled. After having ignored calls … [+3510 chars]
